AssetFulfillmentDecomp.name: AssetFulfillmentDecomp
AssetFulfillmentDecomp.description: Represents the relationship between an ordered asset and its corresponding fulfillment asset.

FulfillmentSourceAssetId.description: The identifier of the relationship between an asset and a fulfillment asset.

FulfillmentTargetAssetId.description: The identifier of the target asset that's being fulfilled.

Name.description: The name of the asset that's being fulfilled.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the request record.

RelationshipType.description: The type of relationship between an asset and a fulfillment asset.

SegmentIdentifier.description: The ID of the ramp segment associated with the asset state period.

Status.description: The status of the fulfillment asset.
